name: exchanger
description: Unit and Currency Converter with NextJS frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm start"
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/dist
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
